title: So I sent an interesting ticket to Riot Support
body:
I asked them if they could reset Taric's Mastery to zero on my account, since he's basically a new champion because of his many changes, and I use the Mastery system to physically gauge my own experience with them. My previous experience with him is basically rendered moot, so it's only fitting that the Mastery level be reset to zero to reflect this. They responded with this: 

 	
> Allen (Riot Games Player Support)
> 
> Apr 18, 04:48
> 
> Hello Lost R,
> 
> Thanks for writing. That's a really good idea or suggestion you got there. Sadly, we don't have the tools to reset a champion mastery point. However, we'd love to hear more about this idea so we can continue to improve the game.
> 
> Riot Games has established a set of forums for our players to be able to submit their feedback and advice. Rioters check these forums every day for suggestions and insight directly from our community.
> 
> NA Forums: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/index.php
> 
> Please know that because our teams receive so many feedback reports daily, we are unfortunately unable to respond to every entry individually. This does not mean your suggestion has been overlooked. We are sorry that we are not able to respond to every post.
> 
> Thank you again for taking the time to contact me with your thoughts. Your passion for League of Legends and participation are a big part of what makes our community so awesome.
> 
> Please let me know if I can assist you with any other requests. Best of luck on the Fields of Justice!

I'm probably an extreme case here, given how eccentric I am, and how I am probably the only person in League who asked to have a champion's mastery reset (usually players just ask for refunds). But by my logic it makes sense. What do you all think? If one of your favored champions had a Sion-grade overhaul, would you ask to have their mastery reset?

replies.body: If they gave the option (as in you could chose not to), then sure, I could get behind this.
Yea, sure, I don't know why Riot shouldn't introduce this since it gets them no money anyway
Im with avantelwings on this,  I would appreciate the option if riot decided to give us it.
Ya actually, I really like this idea man. This is a great, original idea have an upvote ^-^
